io.hekate.core.service

Interface TerminatingService


  • public interface TerminatingService
    Lifecycle interface for services that require termination.

    Methods of this interface get invoked when Hekate instance starts leaving the cluster and during termination.

    Invocation order is:

    1. Fire ClusterLeaveEvent (if joined to the cluster)
    2. preTerminate() all services one by one
    3. Await for ClusterContext.onLeave() notification from the cluster service
    4. terminate() all services one by one
    5. postTerminate() all services one by one

    Note: Termination order takes dependencies into account. If some service A depends on some other service B then it is guaranteed that termination methods of service B will be called after initialization methods of service A.

    See Also:
    InitializingService, DependentService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void postTerminate()
      Post-terminates this service.
      default void preTerminate()
      Pre-terminates this service.
      void terminate()
      Terminates this service.
